lead_paragraph: STOLZBERG--Julie. The world lost one of the great ones on March 20, 2016 when our dear friend, Julie Stolzberg passed away. There won't be a day that goes by when we won't miss her and hope she was with us longer. Her loving advice, warm smile and frighteningly neat handwriting will be forever missed. Our continued love and friendship with her husband, Craig and kids, Emi and Tai will never falter as we live on without her. Our huge hug extends to Julie's sister, Jenny and her husband, Noah and their kids - we mourn with you and will be there to keep Julie's spirit and memory alive forever. Love, The Madover Family 1/3
